questions.question: You are deploying a SageMaker training job that handles sensitive data. Which of the following options would best ensure that the data is protected both at rest and in transit?
options: Enable KMS encryption for data at rest and TLS/SSL for data in transit.
Use S3 bucket policies for access control and VPC endpoints for data transfer.
Store data in an unencrypted S3 bucket but ensure VPC isolation.
Use IAM roles to limit access and KMS for encryption in transit.
correct_answers: Enable KMS encryption for data at rest and TLS/SSL for data in transit.
